pkgmetadata.longdescription: NNG (Nanomsg Next Gen) Lightweight Messaging Library // R binding for NNG (Nanomsg Next Gen), a successor to ZeroMQ. NNG is a socket library providing high-performance scalability protocols, implementing a cross-platform standard for messaging and communications. Serves as a concurrency framework for building distributed applications, utilising 'Aio' objects which automatically resolve upon completion of asynchronous operations.
